sentences: Suu on nähtavasti kõige olulisem osa inimese keha.
context: The Estonian word 'suu' means 'mouth' or 'oral cavity'. It's used to refer to the physical mouth of a person, animal, or even in abstract contexts. In some expressions like 'saama suu täis' (to get one's mouth full), it can be part of idiomatic expressions related to eating or consuming food.
